author: covener
msg: resolve testprocmutex failures on AIX and HP-UX by recognizing EACCES

author: sberlin
msg: simplified keep-alive support.  changed ConnectionKeepAliveStrategy to return time in ms, instead of time & timeunit in two different calls.  reverted ConnectionReleaseTrigger.releaseConnection to take zero params & instead added a setIdleDuration method to ManagedClientConnection, along with converting direct uses of ClientConnectionManager.releaseConnection to instead go through ManagedClientConnection.releaseConnection (which now uses the idle time when giving itself to the manager).
